comments.body: @brendandburns @a-robinson Do you prefer images for examples to come from `gcr.io` or is this location OK? I don't have any problems with it personally, but not sure quite you expect from contributed examples.

One thing I discussed with @brendandburns (for the Hazelcast example) and @satnam6502 for this example, was that we needed to test with images before pushing them to gcr.io/kubernetes. I have no issue with that, for as long as someone does it - I don't have perms for that.
I've tested with these images & very happy with them.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +21,25 @@            add:
              - IPC_LOCK
        image: quay.io/pires/docker-elasticsearch-kubernetes:1.7.1-4
        env:
        - name: KUBERNETES_CA_CERTIFICATE_FILE
